column1: tz,"Tanzania, United Republic of",Finance,6015,2,1156903371,CRDB BANK SimBanking,CRDB BANK PLC,https://apps.apple.com/tz/app/crdb-bank-simbanking/id1156903371?uo=4,0.0,4.07939,2141,Finance,"Benki ni SimBanking! column1: tz,"Tanzania, United Republic of",Finance,6015,3,1313948420,M-Pesa Tanzania,VODACOM TANZANIA PLC,https://apps.apple.com/tz/app/m-pesa-tanzania/id1313948420?uo=4,0.0,4.77066,24566,Finance,"Welcome to the new M-Pesa App
M-Pesa, the largest and most innovative mobile financial service in Tanzania, has enhanced your experience by lauching a new version of the M-Pesa App.
Yes, you heard it right. We have redesigned the look and feel of the App, and greatly improved the user experience.
Moreover, you can also enjoy the exciting new mini apps and services!
So... What else is new in this version?

column2: IOS users from OTHER networks can now enjoy M-Pesa services after being registered
User can pay for a friend ‘Nipige Tafu’ loan
NPK Parking Card QR code scanner, easily & quick payments of your parking fee
New QR code scan for Bills Payments and Pay for Merchants services.
Enhanced User interface to make transfers to Bank much easier

column1: Access to your finances anytime, anywhere

column2: Send money across boarders easily, to Kenya, Uganda, Burundi, Rwanda,

column1: CONGO etc.

column2: Include withdrawal fees in your transfers to make it more convenient for your recipients when withdrawing cash recipient
Transact with ease, by simply selecting your contact on any network from your phone book, favourites or recent recipients
Transfer money from M-Pesa to your bank account or from your bank back to M-Pesa

column1: Pay easily

column2: Make Government Payments, Pay Merchants and Withdraw Cash at Agents using QR codes

column1: It’s secure
You can use Touch ID or Face ID to log in, or authorise your transactions through M-Pesa app. The M-Pesa 4 digit PIN can as well be used!

This is the only official and authorised App for accessing your M-Pesa account in Tanzania (GSMA Mobile Money certified). Vodacom Tanzania cautions customers against downloading or attempting to use of any other App that purports to offer easy access to M-Pesa.
Still have questions?
If you have any queries or feedback about this App, please do get in touch by sending an email to customercare@vodacom.co.tz or calling customer care 100",2018-01-11T17:32:20Z,2025-10-14T07:11:54Z

tz,"Tanzania, United Republic of",Finance,6015,4,825924072,Mixx Tanzania,Millicom Services UK LTD,https://apps.apple.com/tz/app/mixx-tanzania/id825924072?uo=4,0.0,4.81602,55424,Finance,"With the Mixx Tanzania App you can now access your Mixx by Yas wallet conveniently and securely perform all your transactions much faster and easier than ever before.
KEY FEATURES:

column2: Brand New Look & Feel with several Dashboard Choices and Themes
Linking Multiple accounts - user can link up 5 accounts belonging to them and can switch between the accounts.
Send Money - user can select up to 5 accounts to send money to from any network with same amount or different amount per recipient.
Mini Apps - users can access several apps within Mixx Tanzania without the need of downloading more apps to save on space and give wide range of usage.

Gift-Money - a unique feature where users of Mixx Tanzania App can send money to other Mixx Tanzania app users with a Card dedication for various themes like Valentines, Anniversary, Ramadan, Christmas etc
Agents & Shops - users can see locations for service within their close range.
Postpaid Bundles - users can buy Yas packages for Postpaid users for self or other postpaid customers.
Corporate Solutions - for Companies to process Expenses and Retire by their teams, Salary advances and many more.
TIPS (TANQR): Pay and get paid through TIPS (TANQR) by scanning with Mixx Tanzania App to pay and get paid from all MNOs and Banks in Tanzania and other EMV capable apps.

column1: Data Privacy and Security: HTMSL (trading as Mixx by Yas, formely Tigo Pesa Tanzania) is a certified data processor and controller, registered by The Personal Data Protection Commission of Tanzania and certified by global standards of GSMA Mobile Money certification.
Support: For any questions or assistance, contact Mixx by Yas Tanzania support through customercare@yas.co.tz or calling 100.
Office Address: 29th Floor, PSSSF Commercial Complex, Sam Nujoma Road, Dar es Salaam, Tanzania.",2014-04-13T21:31:56Z,2025-11-20T23:59:22Z

tz,"Tanzania, United Republic of",Finance,6015,5,6737184776,Selcom Pesa,Selcom Paytech Limited,https://apps.apple.com/tz/app/selcom-pesa/id6737184776?uo=4,0.0,4.35344,116,Finance,"Switch to Selcom Pesa…or Keep Overpaying
Designed to Help You Keep More of What You Earn.
Most apps quietly charge you more than they should — Selcom Pesa doesn’t.

Selcom Pesa is a digital financial app licensed by the Bank of Tanzania (BoT) and designed for Tanzanian citizens living globally. You can open an account easily using your valid NIDA card or Tanzanian passport.
What Makes Selcom Pesa Stand Out
Choose a Transactional Bundle that Fits Your Lifestyle
Save more as you spend:
• Daily – Kwa Jero: 5 transactions for 24 hours
• Weekly – Wiki Boost: 35 transactions for 7 days
• Monthly – Hello Mwezi: 150 transactions for 30 days
Instant Loans and Credit Score Access
Track your Selcom Pesa Credit Score and unlock pre-approved 7-day and 14-day digital loans up to TZS 1,000,000.
Boost your score by:
• Transacting frequently
• Uploading your mobile money statement
• Repaying on time
Loan Examples
7-Day Loan
• Loan Amount: TZS 50,000
• Interest Fee: TZS 6,500
• Total Repayment within 7 days: TZS 56,500
Penalty added after 7 days: TZS 1695
APR* 16%
14-Day Loan Example
• Loan Amount: TZS 50,000
• Interest Fee: TZS 8,500
• Total Repayment within 14 days: TZS 58,500
Penalty added after 14 days: TZS 2925
APR* 22%
*Annual Percentage Rate (APR)

Jisoti loans are short-term emergency loans. The cost of a Jisoti loan is: a once-off Interest (13% for 7 day loan and 17% for 14 day loan) and a once-off penalty (3% for 7 day loan and 5% for 14 day loan) on outstanding amount.
If the loan is repaid within term (7/14 days), annual cost to the customer is Interest only.

If the loan is repaid after 60 days, the annual cost to the customer is Interest and Penalty (applied once on outstanding unpaid amount). There is no other fee or compounding charge that the customer would be liable to pay at the end of the year or in perpetuity.
Smart and Easy Onboarding
Open your Selcom Pesa account in minutes using just your mobile number and NIDA biometrics.
No paperwork. No hassle.
Flexible Accounts
Manage your Main, Kibubu (Savings), and Qwikrewards balances seamlessly — all in one place.
Secure and Instant Payments
Pay any merchant in Tanzania via TanQR or Lipa Namba — fast, reliable, and secure.
Rewards for Invite
Earn up to TZS 2,000 for every friend who joins Selcom Pesa and starts transacting.
(Terms and Conditions apply.)
Get an Instant Selcom Lipa Namba (TanQR)
Register instantly within the app to receive payments through your Selcom Lipa number — ideal for small businesses, side hustles, and freelancers.
Built for All
• 24/7 customer support (toll-free)
• Bilingual experience — English or Kiswahili
• Advanced encryption and compliance with BoT regulations
Download Selcom Pesa today and experience faster, smarter, and more rewarding financial freedom — built for Tanzanians, wherever you are in the world.",2025-01-11T08:00:00Z,2025-10-15T05:51:47Z

tz,"Tanzania, United Republic of",Finance,6015,6,6742257118,NSSF App,National Social Security Fund (TZ),https://apps.apple.com/tz/app/nssf-app/id6742257118?uo=4,0.0,3.61538,13,Finance,"Mfumo wa ""NSSF TAARIFA"" umebuniwa mahususi kwa ajili ya wanachama. Mfumo huu unamuwezesha mwanachama kupata taarifa za michango yake kwa urahisi. Kupitia mfumo huu, mwanachama anaweza kufanya yafuatayo:
a) Kuangalia Taarifa za Usajili wake (Member Profile):
- Kupata taarifa binafsi za usajili.
b) Kuangalia Taarifa za Michango:
- Kupata taarifa zote za michango iliyowasilishwa na kampuni katika Shirika.
- Kupata taarifa za michango iliyowasilishwa na wanachama wa hiari.
c) Kupata Taarifa za Michango (Statements):
- Kupata taarifa kamili za michango iliyowasilishwa.
d) Uhakiki wa Wastaafu:
- Kuona taarifa za mstaafu.
- Uhakiki
Mfumo huu unalenga kuwezesha mwanachama kuwa na ufahamu zaidi kuhusu michango yake na kusaidia katika kupanga mipango ya kifedha kwa ufanisi.",2025-02-23T08:00:00Z,2025-10-13T10:13:38Z

tz,"Tanzania, United Republic of",Finance,6015,7,1478599443,UTT AMIS,UTT AMIS PLC,https://apps.apple.com/tz/app/utt-amis/id1478599443?uo=4,0.0,3.15108,139,Finance,"UTT Asset Management and Investor Services (UTT AMIS) is a fund management company that deals with establishment, launching and managing collective investment Service. The company also provides Wealth Management Service. UTT AMIS operates based on the Capital Markets and Securities Act, 1994(Amended) and Collective Investment Schemes Regulations, 1997. Currently the company manages five funds which are Umoja, Wekeza Maisha, Watoto, Jikimu and Liquid Funds.

UTT AMIS ni kampuni ya uwekezaji yenye kuhusika na uanzishaji na uendeshaji wa mifuko ya uwekezaji wa pamoja.Kampuni hii pia inatoa huduma za usimamizi wa amana(Wealth Management Services) UTT AMIS inafanya kazi zake kutokana na sheria za masoko ya mitaji na dhamana ya mwaka 1994(iliyorekebishwa) na kanuni ya Mifuko ya Uwekezaji wa Pamoja ya mwaka 1997. UTT AMIS kwa sasa inasimamia mifuko mitano ya uwekezaji ambayo ni Umoja, Wekeza Maisha, Watoto,kujikimu na Ukwasi.",2019-11-05T08:00:00Z,2025-10-06T04:49:07Z

tz,"Tanzania, United Republic of",Finance,6015,8,1529844831,NBC Kiganjani,NATIONAL BANK OF COMMERCE LIMITED,https://apps.apple.com/tz/app/nbc-kiganjani/id1529844831?uo=4,0.0,3.60156,128,Finance,"NBC Kiganjani app

Bank on the go with our fast, secure and easy-to-use banking app. With a full suite of banking services at your fingertips, you can avoid the queues and manage your finances from anywhere, at any time.
With the app you can:
Swift and secure banking:-
•   Open a new account at your convenience.
•   Subscribe to digital banking services.
•   Link and unlink your accounts for banking services.
•   View all accounts including loan accounts.
•   Request for a new debit card.
•   Block or unblock your debit card.
Stay in control with enhanced security:
•   Reset credentials by yourself.
•   Secure login with username and password, biometrics and/or PIN.
Instant Payments:-
•  Seamless bills payment including government billers
•   Instantly get your Luku token on your screen
•   Schedule your recurring bills payments
Seamlessly Transactions:-
•   Easy fund transfer across banks, mobile network operators, and overseas
•   Save your favourite beneficiaries
•   Buy airtime for all local mobile networks in Tanzania
•   Retrieve transaction receipts
Cash Access:-
•   Seamless cash withdrawal without card
•   Find your nearest Branch, ATM or Agent
Download NBC Kiganjani and bank like never before",2020-09-18T07:00:00Z,2025-08-14T17:05:04Z

tz,"Tanzania, United Republic of",Finance,6015,11,1532695595,HaloPesa,VIETTEL ECOMMERCE LIMITED,https://apps.apple.com/tz/app/halopesa/id1532695595?uo=4,0.0,3.33788,293,Finance,"Mobile money is the easiest, fastest and affordable way to send and receive money and also make other transactions anywhere and at anytime.

HaloPesa, the best mobile money service in Tanzania that is determined to bring you the best mobile money experience at the power of your fingertips by launching the HaloPesa App. The App brings to our customers the best mobile money experience and through the HaloPesa App our customers can send and receive money to and from their loved ones, pay for commodities, access their bank accounts and be able to make other digital payments at anytime and anywhere.
App Features:

column2: Secured log in access to your HaloPesa account with you 4 digit code. Remember to keep your code secret and for your eyes only.
Send money to other HaloPesa and non HaloPesa customer with ease.
Purchase airtime and bundles with convenience.
View your transaction history with the full history feature in your HaloPesa App.
Check your account balance anytime and anywhere.
Make payments to different merchants by just selecting within the option given to you by the HaloPesa App.
Make Payments through QR code in paying the merchants.
Transfer money from your virtual wallet to your bank account.
Participate in different extra curriculum activities such as betting, and be able to place your bet through the HaloPesa App.
Be able to make government payment with just a single tap.
Manage your HaloPesa App anytime and anywhere with the condition that you have the access of data connection.
Cash out from the many agents in your surroundings.
Reverse a transaction in the spot without any loss.
Make various payments such as paying bill at the power of your fingertips.
Choose between the language Swahili and English for your comfort ability.

column1: What’s New:
Promotional content

column2: The user will be able to view promotional content in the HaloPesa App as to see what is new in the HaloPesa world.
The User will be able to catch new products and services that the HaloPesa mobile service will launch.
Such information will be displayed so that the user can be up-to-date with new products and services from HaloPesa.

column1: Security Enhancements

column2: A user will be provided with a one time password (OTP) at every transaction whereby the OTP will be sent to the user via SMS to ensure security of the transaction.
The user’s transactions will be highly secured and situations such as theft transactions will be avoided.

column1: Contact Enhancement

column2: A user will be able to access his/her contacts via the HaloPesa App and hence making such transactions with ease.
Users when adding contacts will be able to save their contacts and rest assured be able to use them directly from the App when making transactions.

column1: Accessibility Enhancement.

column2: User will be able to use the HaloPesa App in any device.
User must not register first upon using a different device than the one that is normally in use for the HaloPesa App.",2020-10-29T07:00:00Z,2025-10-10T08:07:55Z

column1: tz,"Tanzania, United Republic of",Finance,6015,12,6744439518,Sawa Pesa,BACHCHI FINANCE PRIVATE LIMITED,https://apps.apple.com/tz/app/sawa-pesa/id6744439518?uo=4,0.0,4.81078,1744,Finance,"Loan Amount and Duration:

tz,"Tanzania, United Republic of",Finance,6015,15,6754965324,Data Self - Portrait,Flora Carmen,https://apps.apple.com/tz/app/data-self-portrait/id6754965324?uo=4,0.0,0,0,Finance,"Data Self-Portrait is a unique application for tracking life data and artistic visualization. By recording daily data such as sleep, consumption, mood and activities, the application transforms the dull numbers into flowing abstract art graphics, allowing you to ""see"" your life patterns from a new perspective. The minimalist information visualization design style, combined with the colorful data flow effect, enables your personalized data portrait to continuously evolve with each data addition, showcasing your unique life trajectory. It supports data statistics analysis, historical record management and data export functions. All data is stored locally, ensuring the protection of your privacy and security.",2025-11-07T08:00:00Z,2025-11-07T09:38:38Z

tz,"Tanzania, United Republic of",Finance,6015,16,6745591063,Pesa Mkononi,PESA-MKONONI TANZANIA CREDIT LIMITED,https://apps.apple.com/tz/app/pesa-mkononi/id6745591063?uo=4,0.0,4.67019,852,Finance,"Pata mikopo ya papo hapo kwa Pesa Mkononi nchini Tanzania

Iwapo unahitaji pesa taslimu haraka kwa ajili ya dharura au gharama za kibinafsi, Pesa Mkononi itakugharamia. Programu yetu ya mkopo ya Tanzania inatoa mikopo ya papo hapo na maombi rahisi, idhini ya haraka, na mchakato wa kuaminika. Iwe unahitaji fedha za ziada kulipia bili au unahitaji kulipia gharama usizotarajia, Pesa Mkononi ni mojawapo ya mifumo inayofaa na inayofaa zaidi ya mikopo ya Tanzania.
Kwa nini uchague Pesa Mkononi?
Pata pesa papo hapo

Pesa Mkononi inatoa mikopo ya mtandaoni inayochakatwa haraka, na hivyo kukupa ufikiaji wa papo hapo wa pesa ndani ya dakika 5. Hakuna tena kusubiri kwenye laini ndefu kwenye benki - pakua tu programu yetu ya mkopo nchini Tanzania, jaza maelezo yako, na upate idhini baada ya dakika chache.
Mchakato rahisi na rahisi wa maombi

Kuomba mkopo kwa Pesa Mkononi ni rahisi kama vile kugusa mara chache kwenye simu yako. Programu yetu ya mkopo ya Tanzania ni rafiki kwa mtumiaji, na inahakikisha mchakato usio na usumbufu. Iwe unahitaji mkopo wa papo hapo au unataka tu kuchunguza chaguo zako za mkopo, Pesa Mkononi hukupa unyumbufu unaostahili.
Chaguo Rahisi za Ulipaji
Tunaelewa kuwa kila akopaye ana mahitaji ya kipekee, kwa hivyo tunatoa masharti rahisi ya ulipaji ili iwe rahisi kwako kudhibiti mkopo wako.
Kwa wakopaji ambao wana ugumu wa kurejesha, tunatoa chaguo la kuongeza muda wa kurejesha, kutoa unyumbulifu zaidi na kuepuka chaguomsingi. Ukiwa na Pesa Mkononi, unadhibiti.
Uboreshaji wa Alama za Mikopo

Programu ya mkopo ya Pesa Mkononi huwasaidia wateja kuboresha historia yao ya mikopo. Ukirejesha kwa wakati, alama zako za mkopo zitaboreka kiotomatiki. Hii hukusaidia kupata mkopo mkubwa na masharti bora zaidi katika siku zijazo.
Ufuatiliaji wa mkopo wa wakati halisi

Programu yetu hukuruhusu kufuatilia hali ya mkopo wako kwa wakati halisi - kutoka kwa kutuma ombi lako hadi ulipaji na urejeshaji. Kipengele hiki huwaruhusu wateja wetu kuendelea kufahamishwa kuhusu hali yao ya mikopo na kudhibiti mikopo yao kwa ufanisi kwa kutumia Pesa Mkononi.
Salama na Salama

Faragha yako ndiyo kipaumbele chetu kikuu. Pesa Mkononi inachukua kila hatua kuhakikisha kuwa data yako inalindwa kwa usalama wa hali ya juu. Unaweza kutuma ombi kwa ujasiri, ukijua kwamba taarifa zako za kibinafsi ziko salama ukiwa nasi.
Nani anaweza kutuma maombi? Unahitaji nini?
Lazima awe na umri wa miaka 18 au zaidi
Lazima uwe na mapato thabiti (iwe umeajiriwa au umejiajiri)
Nambari halali ya simu iliyounganishwa na yoyote (m-pesa, airtel money, tigo pesa, halopesa)
Kitambulisho cha kitaifa cha uthibitishaji wa kitambulisho.
Ukitimiza mahitaji haya, unastahiki kutuma maombi ya mikopo yetu mtandaoni kupitia programu yetu ya mkopo nchini Kenya. Rahisi, haraka na salama!
Jinsi ya kupata mkopo katika Pesa Mkononi Loan App:
1. Sakinisha programu ya simu kwenye simu yako mahiri
2. Kukamilisha usajili mfupi, kutoa taarifa muhimu
3. Chagua kiasi cha mkopo na muda wa kurejesha
4. Thibitisha ombi lako na usubiri idhini
5. Kagua masharti ya mkataba wa mkopo na uthibitishe
6. Pokea pesa katika akaunti yako ya pochi ya simu ndani ya dakika chache
Maelezo ya jumla kuhusu mikopo ya mtandaoni katika Pesa Mkononi Loan App:
- Kipindi cha chini cha mkopo: siku 91
- Muda wa juu wa mkopo: siku 180
- Kiasi cha juu cha mkopo: Hadi 800,000 TZS
- Kiwango cha Asilimia cha Mwaka (APR): 36%
Mfano wa hesabu ya kawaida ya mkopo:
Ukiomba mkopo wa TZS 200,000 na muda wa mkopo wa siku 90, gharama ya jumla ni TZS 218,000, ambapo TZS 18,000 ni riba.
Anza sasa!

Kukopa kwa Pesa Mkononi ni rahisi na rahisi. Pakua programu yetu ya mkopo na upate pesa kwa urahisi wakati wowote, mahali popote. Tuko hapa kukusaidia kila hatua ya njia. Anza leo na ujue ni kwa nini watu wengi huchagua Pesa Mkononi kwa mahitaji yao ya kifedha.
Sera ya Faragha: https://mkononi.top/PrivacyPolicy-Ki.html
Unaweza kuwasiliana na kituo chetu cha huduma kwa wateja kwa support@mkononi.top",2025-07-09T07:00:00Z,2025-10-09T11:21:06Z

tz,"Tanzania, United Republic of",Finance,6015,17,413251709,MetaTrader 5,MetaQuotes Software Corp.,https://apps.apple.com/tz/app/metatrader-5/id413251709?uo=4,0.0,4.74828,2320,Finance,"Connect to hundreds of brokers and trade in financial markets using MetaTrader 5 for iPhone and iPad.

tz,"Tanzania, United Republic of",Finance,6015,18,283646709,"PayPal - Send, Manage, Pay","PayPal, Inc.",https://apps.apple.com/tz/app/paypal-send-manage-pay/id283646709?uo=4,0.0,4.60523,803,Finance,"There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay

ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE

Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​

*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply
MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**

*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​

tz,"Tanzania, United Republic of",Finance,6015,22,6745687364,Salama Cash,SOLEX COMMERCIAL & CREDIT PRIVATE LIMITED,https://apps.apple.com/tz/app/salama-cash/id6745687364?uo=4,0.0,4.61961,510,Finance,"Salama Cash offers transparent, unsecured personal loans tailored for local residents. All costs are clearly disclosed before you submit an application, and there are no hidden charges or processing fees.
Loan Parameters
Repayment term: 91 – 360 days
Annual Percentage Rate (APR): up to 20 %
Representative Example
Borrower takes 100000 for 180 days at an APR of 20 %.
Total repayment ≈ 109863, repaid on or before the due date.
Actual figures depend on the amount and term you choose, but the APR never exceeds 20 % and no additional fees apply.
Eligibility Requirements
Age between 21 and 60 years
Valid national ID
Active local mobile wallet linked to your mobile number
Stable source of income sufficient to meet repayments
How to Apply
Download and install Salama Cash.
Register with your mobile number and complete identity verification.
Select the loan amount and term that suit your needs.
Review the cost breakdown, then submit the application.
Upon approval, funds are disbursed directly to your linked mobile wallet.
Repay on or before the due date through the same wallet.
Key Points
No collateral or guarantor is required.
Early repayment is accepted without penalty and reduces total interest.
Timely repayment helps you build a positive repayment record for possible higher limits in the future.
All data are protected under local regulations and used solely to assess creditworthiness and service your loan.
Responsible Borrowing
Borrow only what you can comfortably repay. Missing payments may result in late interest and affect your credit profile.
Customer Support
For questions or assistance, please reach out via the in‑app help centre or email getintouch@solexcmclcredit.com.",2025-05-29T07:00:00Z,2025-06-20T07:11:29Z

tz,"Tanzania, United Republic of",Finance,6015,25,6748180699,Pesa Bora,SOLEMN FINANCE AND LEASING PRIVATE LIMITED,https://apps.apple.com/tz/app/pesa-bora/id6748180699?uo=4,0.0,4.73714,525,Finance,"Pesa Bora is a mobile lending app created for people in Tanzania. It offers accessible loans with clear terms, no hidden costs, and a fast, fully digital application process. Whether you're managing everyday expenses or unexpected needs, Pesa Bora gives you a practical financial option backed by transparent policies.
Key Features:
Loan Amount: 100,000 to 2,000,000
Repayment Term: 91 to 270 days
Annual Percentage Rate (APR): Up to 22%
Fees: No service charges, no processing fees
Disbursement & Repayment: Handled via your local mobile wallet
Quick Review Process: Simple application and fast response
Example Calculation:
Suppose you borrow 100,000 for 91 days at the maximum APR of 22%.
The daily interest rate is approximately 0.06027%.
Over 91 days, total interest would be:
Total repayment amount:
100000 (principal) + 548 (interest) = 100,548
No service fee is charged, and the amount you receive is the full 100,000. You repay 100,548 at the end of the loan term.
Eligibility:
Must be a Tanzanian resident
Aged between 20 and 58 years
Must have a valid local mobile wallet account
Provide accurate personal and contact information
What You Get:
No hidden fees — the amount you see is what you repay
No upfront payments or deductions
No collateral required
Transparent terms and responsible lending practices
Pesa Bora does not charge any additional or unexpected fees. Loan limits may increase based on repayment history and usage.
Contact Us:
For support or inquiries, please email: finance@solemnfinance.com",2025-07-11T07:00:00Z,2025-08-12T07:43:14Z
